title: 23 Cute Curly Cats to Turn Your Day Into a Wholesome Tangle of Purrs
description: Gooood meowrning, feline fam. We learned something new today, and it's not often that we learn something new about cats as someone who considers themselves an expurrt on all things feline-related. We love to write about unique cats because they're just so cool to look at (and awwdorable!), and today we found a new breed of cat that we had never heard of before - the Selkirk Rex! Actually, any cat breed with the name "Rex" in it should have some sort of curly-haired gene.These cats are born with a rare genetic mutation that causes their fur to be curly, and it is literally the cutest thing on the internet. No, they didn't just get back from the hairdresser - they were born this way! They look so soft and cuddly that even just scrolling through pictures of them wraps our hearts in a wholesome feline embrace. Give yourself a nice scroll and turn your day into a wholesome tangle of purrs thanks to these kitty cuties!Fluff. Chaos. Drama! Our weekly cat newsletter has it all -  subscribe here.
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: 23 Cute Curly Cats to Turn Your Day Into a Wholesome Tangle of Purrs - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Gooood meowrning, feline fam. We learned something new today, and it's not often that we learn something new about cats as someone who considers themselves an expurrt on all things feline-related. We love to write about unique cats because they're just so cool to look at (and awwdorable!), and today we found a new breed of cat that we had never heard of before - the Selkirk Rex! Actually, any cat breed with the name "Rex" in it should have some sort of curly-haired gene.

These cats are born with a rare genetic mutation that causes their fur to be curly, and it is literally the cutest thing on the internet. No, they didn't just get back from the hairdresser - they were born this way! They look so soft and cuddly that even just scrolling through pictures of them wraps our hearts in a wholesome feline embrace. Give yourself a nice scroll and turn your day into a wholesome tangle of purrs thanks to these kitty cuties!

Fluff. Chaos. Drama! Our weekly cat newsletter has it all -  subscribe here.
